item.title: Media Features
item.description: @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) { /** add styles here **/ } Media Feature/Attribute Media features allows you to specify different viewport attributes and are always expressed in parentheses @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) { body { /* styles go here */ } p { /* styles go here */ } .some-style { /* styles go here */ } } The styles in the media query above will only be applied when the viewport width is greater than or equal to 768px Available Media Query Attributes (Features) The following is a list of Media Features available
